Constructor Detail

MimeMagic.MimeMagicMatcher

public MimeMagic.MimeMagicMatcher(int offset,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  java.lang.String value,
                                  java.lang.String mimetype,
                                  java.lang.String encoding)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Create a MIME Magic matcher based on magic.mime definition line (see http://acm.ist.utl.pt/cgi-bin/man/man2html?5+magic)

Parameters:
offset - byte position where to start matching condition
type - Type of matcher (numerical or String for now)
value - Value to look after
mimetype - MIME type associated to this matcher
encoding - Default encoding associated to this MIME type
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

match

public java.lang.String match(byte[] filebyte)
Check if this filter matches given byte array

Parameters:
filebyte - The file first bytes to parse
Returns:
MIME type of provided bytes if filter (and subfilters) matches, null otherwise

unsignedInt

public static final long unsignedInt(byte[] b,
                                     int offset)
Converts a 4 byte array of unsigned bytes to an long

Parameters:
b - an array containing the 4 unsigned bytes to parse
offset - the position at which the long coded on 4 unsigned bytes starts
Returns:
a long representing the unsigned INT

Converts a two byte array to an integer

Parameters:

offset - the position in the byte array at which the unsigned short starts
Returns:
an integer representing the unsigned short
